issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Move DataPageBuilder to test_common
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5281](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5281). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataPageBuilder is a helpful tool for mocking test page data, it's worthy to move it to test_common so that other parts can reuse it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5281?focusedCommentId=16836629) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4269
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4269>
